name: deliriously
content:
Add to word list

in a way that shows that you are unable to think or speak clearly because of fever or mental confusion: I cried deliriously until my mother arrived. He moaned deliriously and covered his eyes with his arm. See
delirious
in an extremely happy or excited way: Kate and Peter are deliriously happy together. He was deliriously in love. See
delirious
More examplesFewer examplesSuzanne alternated between sweating and shivering, sometimes moaning incoherently or talking deliriously.They swayed deliriously to the music.The team were greeted deliriously by huge crowds.
